title: Belkin MagSafe-Compatible Charger, 2-in-1 Magnetic Foldable Charger 15W - Qi2-Certified Wireless Charging for Apple iPhone 16, Apple Watch, Samsung Galaxy S25 w/Non-Slip Base, PSU Included - White White 2 in 1
description: FAST CHARGE plus THE LATEST QI2 TECHNOLOGY: Conveniently place your phone on the magnetic charger to fast charge your iPhone, Samsung, or Qi2 compatible device up to 15W. With Qi2, you get up to 2x faster wireless charging.

top_reviews.title: Good product
top_reviews.body: Wish I had purchased a long time ago. Great charging station and love all in one. The fact that you don't need all extra cable's for phone and watch is a big plus. Would recommend for anyone who likes to have things in a neat order and a great unit for traveling. Read more
